season ticket.translation[0].definitions: a ticket that allows you to make a lot of journeys during a particular period of time, or go to all the games, concerts etc being held during a particular time. Season tickets cost less than it would cost to buy a ticket for each journey, game etc
season ticket holder (=someone who owns a season ticket)
season ticket.translation[1].definitions: a ticket for several journeys, performances, games etc that costs less than paying separately each time
a season ticket holder (=someone who has one)
